Name: Pan War Band
Description: Increases Movement Speed and Reload Speed by 3%  and Fire Rate by 2% for each ally wearing this ring.
Location: Infested Abyss has a coop puzzle. One player on Pressure Plate, other Player gets on the pillar that was lowered. Player on Pressure plate then steps off of plate. Reward is Pan War Band.;Exclusive to The Forgotten Kingdom DLC.
